          <title>
            <string language="en">Other plastids</string>
            <string language="ro">Alte plastide</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Notions about the main types of plastids, focusing on
							non-photosynthesized plastids for which are presented the location, role
							and genesis in the plant organisms.</string>
            <string language="ro">Notiuni despre principalele tipuri de plastide, punând
							accent pe plastidele nefotosintetizatoare pentru care prezinta
							localizarea, rolul si geneza în cadrul organismelor vegetale.</string>
